content:
To my knowledge, there have not been any official talks of a reunion of Before The Game. However, the hosts and guests have not ruled out the possibility of a reunion, and many have expressed fond memories of their time on the show.

For example, in a 2019 interview, host Ryan Fitzgerald said that he would love to do a reunion show and that he still keeps in touch with Anthony Lehmann and Andrew Maher. He also mentioned that many guests have gone on to become close friends, and that they all still talk about their time on the show.

Similarly, in a recent interview, guest Sam Pang stated that he would be happy to participate in a reunion or tribute show honoring Before The Game. However, he also acknowledged that it would be challenging to get everyone together due to their busy schedules and the changes in the television industry since the show's cancellation.

So, while there have not been any concrete plans for a reunion, it seems that there is still interest among the hosts and guests in reuniting and reliving the memories of Before The Game.
